meanings.sent1: She filmed the birthday party with her camera.
meanings.sent2: The director filmed the movie in black and white.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally filmed itself playing with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: His memories were filmed in vivid colors in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was filmed by the horizon in stunning hues.

meanings.sent1: He filmed the wildlife documentary in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The photographer filmed the rare bird in its natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel filmed a cooking show with acorns as ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was filmed in his heart forever.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm was filmed by the lightning in the night sky.
